text: The Undercover Man is a 1949 American crime thriller movie directed by Joseph H. Lewis and starring Glenn Ford, Nina Foch, James Whitmore, Barry Kelley, David Bauer, Howard St. John, Leo Penn, Kay Medford. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1949 crime movies Category:1949 thriller movies Category:1940s crime thriller movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Joseph H. Lewis Category:Columbia Pictures movies
title: The Undercover Man
